```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
library(devtools)
load_all()
library(RCmodels)
source('~/Documents/Rfolder/RCmodels/R/plm_methods.R')
library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)
data(V316_river)
f <- Q~W
bplm.fit <- bplm(f,V316_river)
```

##Plotting examples

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bplm.fit,type = 'rating_curve')
```
```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bplm.fit,type = 'residuals')
```
```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bplm.fit,type = 'histogram','hyperparameters')
```
```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(bplm.fit,type = 'histogram','a','b','c')
```
